long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Say goodbye to the hassle of sharing information across browsers and systems! Forget about installing multiple apps like WhatsApp or relying on email. With our cutting-edge extension, sharing text across browsers becomes effortless. Plus, with Zotit, you can access your notes seamlessly on Android, iOS, or our user-friendly website at https://web.zotit.app, ensuring your data is always at your fingertips, no matter where you are.
